forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers overnight. Low 54F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 15C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High near 60F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with thunderstorms by evening. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms. High 59F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early followed by increasing clouds and a few showers later at night. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 47F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High around 15C. S winds shifting to W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 59F. S winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 62F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 61F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
